content: # vgreduce homevg /dev/dasde1 Removed "/dev/dasde1" from volume group "homevg" The source volume is now ready for reassignment, or retirement. Moving data from one physical volume to another physical volume without taking the file system offline was demonstrated. 414 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 © Copyright IBM Corp. 2015, 2016, 2021. All rights reserved. 415 Chapter 14. Working with networks This chapter describes the several miscellaneous tasks that you might need to perform and includes the following topics:  “Setting up a private interconnect” on page 416  “Creating a HiperSockets device between logical partitions” on page 418  “Configuring a port group by using Link Aggregation Control Protocol” on page 421 14 416 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 14.1 Setting up a private interconnect Having networked communications between different hosts that belong to a certain group can be beneficial.
